trustfund:
TF026365-INDO-GANGETIC RICE-WHEAT INITIATIVE,TF022513-NATIONAL AGRICULTURAL
            TECHNOLOGY PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The development objectives of the
            National Agricultural Technology Project are to: i) improve
            the efficiency of the Indian Council of Agricultural
            Research (ICAR) organization and management systems; ii)
            enhance the performance and effectiveness of priority
            research programs and of scientists in responding to the
            technological needs of farmers; and iii) develop models that
            improve the effectiveness and financial sustainability of
            the technology dissemination system with greater
            accountability to, and participation by, the farming
            communities.  The project components are: 1) Development of
            the ICAR's organization and management systems; 2)
            Support for agro-ecosystems research through sponsored and
            competitive grants program; and 3) Support for pilot program
            to test support for innovations in technology dissemination.
